entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to flurries this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
